hymn.title: God has not giv'n us a spirit of fear
hymn.category: Various Aspects of the Inner Life—The Human Spirit

layout.singingstanza: God has not giv'n us a spir -- it of fear— There's pow'r deep with -- in, pow'r deep with -- in! We have His Word— broth -- ers, sis -- ters, let's hear— That pow'r deep with -- in may flow out. O there's pow'r, pow'r, o -- ver -- com -- ing pow'r, Deep with -- in, deep with -- in; O there's pow'r, pow'r, nor -- mal Christ -- ian pow'r In the spir -- it God's giv -- en us!

lyrics.stanza: O there's pow'r, pow'r, overcoming pow'r, Deep within, deep within; O there's pow'r, pow'r, normal Christian pow'r In the spirit God's given us!
